name: Plumb Crazy!
overview: Connect the pipe bits to the barrel spigot before the timer runs out, as shown by the orange bar on the right. Pressing fire picks up a bit, assembles it, and F1 and F3 switches between your pocket contents. Press F1 to switch to your spanner which disassembles a bit if you choose the wrong relief pipe segment. Avoid the rocks and beware the ghost!
